so_29307073: #!/bin/bash
VAR1="/path/to/source/root"
VAR2="/path/to/target/root"

VARS=("VAR1" "VAR2" "VAR3")
for var in ${VARS[*]}; do
    echo "value of $var is ${!var}"
done
